General.Name: Shenzhen WOTE Advanced Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen WOTE Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale, of polymer materials and engineering plastic products in China and internationally. It offers LCP, PPA, polyphenylsulfone, polyethersulfone, polysulfone, PAEK, polytetrafluoroethylene, fluorine-containing polymer materials, electromagnetic shielding EMI material, elastomer carbon fiber, carbon nanotube composite materials, and customized polymer. Shenzhen WOTE Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Building 7, International Innovation Val, Shenzhen, China

2.Name: Mr. Liang  Zhang
